entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a person who suffered at James's hands. The text describes Snape's suffering and Harry trying to make a case for him deserving it.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is described as the one who started the trouble with Snape. He is also mentioned as being married to Lily.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is described as Harry's mother and James's wife. She intervened in the situation between James and Snape.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone who said he was bored, which led to James starting trouble with Snape.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who made Lupin prefect in the hope that he would be able to control James and Sirius.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as someone who was made prefect by Dumbledore.
